name: The Super Lame Squint Man: Amazing Adventures
name_original: The Super Lame Squint Man: Amazing Adventures
description:
The Super Lame Squint Man: Amazing Adventures is a game developed by Schblah Jam. It was originally released in 2017.
You can play The Super Lame Squint Man: Amazing Adventures on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
